channel.title: Mastery on Rich with Agility
channel.description: Recent content in Mastery on Rich with Agility

item.title: Becoming the Karate Kid of Agile
item.description: The year is 1984. You move to a new city and now some kids are beating you up because you’re getting friendly with the exÂ­-girlfriend of one of them. You need to learn how to defend yourself. Okay, so you’re probably not The Karate Kid. Much has changed in 30 years. Your competition is gaining market share, and you’re struggling to keep up. You need to take action in the new year and adopting Agile techniques seems like a way to compete.
